name: Segmed
headline: Real-World Data for Health Innovation
description:
Segmed provides at-scale access to novel clinical data globally, offering millions of diagnostic-grade medical images to accelerate innovation and mature the evidence needs of life sciences and technology industry.
‍
Our solutions allow you to access a Real World Data (RWD) network to facilitate rapid discovery and investigational capability of imaging data, development of early disease detection & prediction models, improved patient recruitment and reduced operating burden to access therapeutic data ecosystem.

founders.name: Adam Koszek, Cofounder/CTO
founders.description: CTO, co-founder, and board member at Segmed, where we revolutionized access to imaging Real-World Data. I led the product, engineering, integration, and security teams, driving innovation in our platform that processed and de-identified billions of medical images. Our solution empowered over 20 companies to obtain critical data for FDA regulatory submissions while delivering tangible ROI to participating hospitals.

founders.name: Martin Willemink, Co-founder
founders.description: Co-founder and CEO at Segmed, Inc.

![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6669e17ae41ad54eb66df946/6669e17ae41ad54eb66df978_line-hero1.webp)
# Real-World Data for Health Innovation
Segmed provides at-scale access to novel clinical data globally, offering millions of diagnostic-grade medical images to accelerate innovation and mature the evidence needs of [life sciences and technology industry.](https://segmed.ai/</solutions>)‍Our solutions allow you to access a [real-world data (RWD)](https://segmed.ai/<https:/www.segmed.ai/resources/blog/how-segmed-streamlines-access-to-rwd>) network to facilitate rapid discovery and investigational capability of imaging data, development of early disease detection & prediction models, improved patient recruitment and reduced operating burden to access therapeutic data ecosystem.
[**Read our latest News**](https://segmed.ai/<https:/www.segmed.ai/news>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6669e17ae41ad54eb66df946/6669e17ae41ad54eb66df979_line-hero2.webp)
Solutions
We serve the pharmaceutical, medical devices and technology industries in need of longitudinal, practice & device-diverse and clinical validated data.
[Our Solutions](https://segmed.ai/</solutions>)
1.
## [For Life Sciences R&DDiscover the ultimate source for comprehensive longitudinal disease data, unlocking fit-for-purpose regulatory-grade multimodal datasets and unleashing infinite possibilities with millions of tokenized studies.Learn More](https://segmed.ai/</solutions/for-life-sciences-rd>)
2.
## [For Medical Devices AI R&DOne-stop shop for your artificial intelligence (AI) training and FDA/CE regulatory data through subscription to Segmed high-quality database and regulatory-grade validation datasets.Learn More](https://segmed.ai/</solutions/for-medical-devices-and-ai-rd>)
4.
## [For Clinical Data Management Data De-IdentificationImage Data ExtractionMedical Imaging Data ExplorationLearn More](https://segmed.ai/</solutions/for-data-management>)
3.
## [For Healthcare ProvidersYour medical imaging data can drive groundbreaking innovation in healthcare.Learn More](https://segmed.ai/</solutions/for-healthcare-providers>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6669e17ae41ad54eb66df946/6669e17ae41ad54eb66df97a_solutions-texture%7C.webp)
Customers
Companies driving healthcare innovation with [Real-World Imaging Data](https://segmed.ai/<https:/www.segmed.ai/resources/blog/real-world-imaging-data-as-an-external-control-arm>)

Create more equitable healthcare outcomes by leveraging the power of data.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6669e17ae41ad54eb66df946/6669e17ae41ad54eb66df97c_image-back-home%20copy.webp)
Read More
Our Press Releases
[Newsroom](https://segmed.ai/</news>)
### [Segmed’s RWiD integrated into Bayer platform to the development of AI-powered solutionSegmed’s 100 million imaging studies will help power the new AI innovation platform from Bayer in Radiology, enabling organizations to build AI-powered healthcare solutions to benefit radiologists and patients. ](https://segmed.ai/</news/segmed-rwid-solution-to-be-integrated-into-bayer-ai-platform>)
### [Protege and Segmed Partner to Unlock Medical Imaging Data for AI/ML DevelopmentThis collaboration will allow developers to leverage Segmed’s rich data resources on the Protege platform, empowering them to incorporate medical imaging data to better contextualize the patient journey.](https://segmed.ai/</news/protege-and-segmed-partner-to-unlock-medical-imaging-data-for-ai-ml-development>)
## Segmed Unveils New Brand Identity and Introduces Openda, the Next Evolution for Its Insight Platform
This rebranding initiative reflects Segmed’s commitment to not only being the leading imaging data provider to the AI healthcare space, but also bringing medical imaging data to life sciences and biopharma. 
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6669e17ae41ad54eb66df946/6675b4a02a6974d6d5c172a2_Lifescince-text1.webp)

generated_description:
**Segmed: Pioneering Real-World Data for Health Innovation**

Founded in 2019 and hailing from Silicon Valley's epicenter in Palo Alto, Segmed is on a mission that resonates with the future of healthcare: to provide access to real-world data (RWD) for health innovation. As an alumni of Y Combinator's W20 batch, Segmed has rapidly positioned itself as a key player in the health-tech arena.

Segmed specializes in offering a vast repository of diagnostic-grade medical images, amounting to millions of cases from healthcare settings around the globe. This is more than just a data dump; it's a transformational tool that powers research and development in life sciences and technology. Their solutions facilitate everything from early disease detection and predictive modeling to enhancing patient recruitment processes, all while streamlining the often cumbersome therapeutic data ecosystem.

### What They Offer

Segmed caters primarily to sectors like pharmaceuticals, medical devices, and healthcare technology, providing essential longitudinal clinical data that is validated and ready for regulatory purposes. Their offerings include:

1. **Life Sciences R&D**: Comprehensive datasets for regulatory-grade research.
2. **Medical Devices AI R&D**: High-quality databases for AI training and validation.
3. **Clinical Data Management**: Streamlined services for data extraction and de-identification.
4. **Healthcare Provider Solutions**: Leveraging medical imaging data to drive innovative healthcare solutions.

Their strategic partnerships include heavyweights like Bayer and various top-tier universities, emphasizing their role in advancing healthcare through data.

### The Numbers Speak

Segmed's impact is illustrated by impressive statistics:
- Over 100 million imaging studies collected from 2,000+ healthcare partner sites.
- Datasets supporting 35+ FDA-cleared products.
- Their reach spans all 50 states in the U.S. and extends across five continents.

With a dedicated team of 32 employees, Segmed is not just about collecting data—it's about creating equitable healthcare outcomes through smart, accessible solutions.

### The Future with Segmed

As the healthcare landscape evolves, Segmed is poised to be at the forefront of real-world data utilization, helping organizations harness the power of imaging data. For those in the life sciences or healthcare technology sectors looking to innovate, Segmed offers a valuable partnership to accelerate discoveries that could reshape patient care as we know it.

For further insights or to explore potential collaborations, you can visit their website at [Segmed.ai](https://segmed.ai) or request a demo to see their solutions in action.
